alert.note: Alert for Inland Broward County; Metro Broward County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 16 at 6:54PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Broward County through 730 PM EDT... At 654 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking a strong thunderstorm near Mile Marker 30 On Alligator Alley, or 15 miles west of Pembroke Pines, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Weston, Mile Marker 30 On Alligator Alley, East Toll Gate On Alligator Alley, Intersection I-75 And U.S. 27 and Intersection Alligator Alley And Miami Canal. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes.

area.areaDesc: Inland Broward County; Metro Broward County
